sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import 'bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js'; import NavBar from './components/NavBar'; const Cart = () => { const initialProducts = [ { id: 1168761308, quantity: 2, name: 'Vintage Clock', category: 'Tech', price: 18.34, image: 'https://cdn.bootstrapstudio.io/products/product-21_sm.jpg', }, { id: 589605485, quantity: 1, name: 'Reusable Cup', category: 'Cups', price: 35.39, image: 'https://cdn.bootstrapstudio.io/products/product-18_sm.jpg', }, ]; const [products, setProducts] = useState(initialProducts); // Calculate subtotal const calculateSubtotal = () => { return products.reduce((sum, product) => sum + product.price * product.quantity, 0).toFixed(2); }; const handleQuantityChange = (id, delta) => { setProducts((prevProducts) => prevProducts.map((product) => product.id === id ? { ...product, quantity: Math.max(product.quantity + delta, 1), // Prevent quantity from going below 1 } : product ) ); }; return ( <>
Shopping Cart
Product
Price
Quantity
Total
{products.map((product) => (
{product.name}
{product.category}
${product.price.toFixed(2)}
handleQuantityChange(product.id, -1)} > -
handleQuantityChange(product.id, 1)} > +
${product.price.toFixed(2)}
handleQuantityChange(product.id, -1)} > -
handleQuantityChange(product.id, 1)} > +
${(product.price * product.quantity).toFixed(2)}
))}
Subtotal: ${calculateSubtotal()}
Checkout
); }; export default Cart;
